t = int(raw_input())

while t>0:
    s = raw_input().strip()
    alpha = [0]*52
    for i in range(len(s)):
        for k in range(97,123):
            if s[i] == chr(k):
                alpha[k-71] +=1
        for p in range(65,91):
            if s[i]==chr(p):
                alpha[p-65]+=1

    sum=0
    for i in range(52):
        sum += alpha[i]//2 + alpha[i] %2
    print sum


    t-=1
